Package com.idevicesinc.sweetblue.internal

Interface IBleDevice

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IBleNode
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    P_BleDeviceImpl
    public interface IBleDevice
extends IBleNode
    Interface which represents a Bluetooth Device (a peripheral)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface Description
      static class  IBleDevice.DefaultFactory  
      static interface  IBleDevice.Factory
      Factory interface used to create new instances of IBleDevice

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static IBleDevice.Factory DEFAULT_FACTORY
      Default factory implementation which instantiates BleDeviceImpl
